platformOverview.title: 2.1 Platform Overview
platformOverview.intro: The Assessment Hub is a comprehensive organizational assessment platform that provides:
items: Organizational Culture Assessment (OCAI) tools
Baldrige Excellence Framework assessments
Multi-user access management for organizations
Secure assessment data collection and analysis
Reporting and analytics capabilities
Data export and visualization tools

userRoles.title: 2.2 User Roles
items: Administrators: Full platform access, user management, organization settings
Facilitators: Assessment management, participant access, report generation
Employees/Participants: Assessment participation, response submission

accountCreation.title: 3.1 Account Creation
accountCreation.intro: To access certain features of the platform, you must create an account. You agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
Maintain and update your information as necessary
Maintain the security of your password and account
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use

accountTypes.title: 3.2 Account Types
items: Credential-based accounts: For administrators and facilitators
Access key accounts: For assessment participants
Demo accounts: For testing and evaluation purposes

permitted.intro: You may use the platform for:

Conducting authorized organizational culture evaluations

Generating reports for authorized stakeholders
Training and development activities

ownership.title: 5.1 Data Ownership
ownership.p1: Assessment data belongs to the organization that commissioned the assessment. Individual responses are anonymized and aggregated for privacy protection.

usage.title: 5.2 Data Usage
items: Assessment data is used solely for organizational analysis and reporting
Individual responses remain confidential and anonymous
Aggregate data may be used for platform improvement and research
Data sharing is limited to authorized organizational personnel

consent.title: 5.3 Consent
consent.p1: By participating in assessments, you consent to the collection, processing, and use of your responses as described in our Privacy Policy.
